block_comment: The block of code serves a data assignment task. Particularly, it assigns the value of "app_ecc_multiple_err_r" to "app_ecc_multiple_err". In Verilog, the "assign" keyword fulfills this task by continuously assigning the value on its right to the variable on its left. So, whenever "app_ecc_multiple_err_r" changes, "app_ecc_multiple_err" will be instantly updated with the new value.
